meanings.definition: A hardened layer of calcium carbonate in soil.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found calcrete while excavating the ancient site.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed a patch of calcrete in his field.
meanings.sent3: The calcrete in the soil seemed to be playing hide and seek with the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The calcrete layer was as stubborn as a rock, resisting any attempts to break through.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the calcrete sparkled like a tiny diamond in the dirt.
